document_data.name: Syken Nightblaze
document_data.mainbody: '''Great Chief Syken Nightblaze''' was the leader of the [[Gray Wolf Tribe]] during the latter half of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Syken had one daughter, [[Envir Sykensdottir]], a strong leader in her own right.
document_data.History: Sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]] of [[1485 DR]], Skyen was killed by a band of [[adventurer]]s that came from the northern city of [[Neverwinter]].
